CS:GO is one of those games where you're either really into it or don't play it at all. There is no middle ground. If you do get into it, i can promise you one of the most competitively sound games of all time. Yes, the community bitches and moans over it, but all of that is very, very minor things that don't really matter in the grand scheme of things. Just don't play it for free, though. Paying $20 is worth not having tons of cheaters in your games.

Just be prepared to spend hundreds of hours of your life in it without noticing the time passing by.
best game in its class.. totally satisfied with the purchase
